summary: MALFUNCTION OF FUEL FILTER.  WAS REPLACED ON TWO DIFFERENT OCCASSIONS.  MALFUNCTION OF STEERING ASSEMBLY.  WAS REPLACED TWICE ON TWO DIFFERENT OCCASSIONS.  MALFUNCTION OF BRAKING SYSTEM.  WAS REPLACED ON TWO DIFFERENT OCCASSIONS.    ALL WITHIN A 16 MONTH PERIOD AFTER PURCHASING THE AUTOMOBILE IN MAY OF 2001.  IT IS A 2001 FORD FOCUS ZX3.
